journals/ijautcomp/JiaZ18.title: Output regulation of multiple heterogeneous switched linear systems.
journals/ijautcomp/JiaZ18.abstract: This paper addresses the cooperative output regulation problem of a class of multi-agent systems (MASs). Each agent is a switched linear system. We propose an agent-dependent multiple Lyapunov function (MLF) approach to design the switching law for each switched agent. The distributed controller for each agent is constructed based on a dynamic compensator. A sufficient condition for the solvability of the output regulation problem of switched agent networks is presented by distributed controllers and agent-dependent multiple Lyapunov function approach. Finally, simulation results demonstrate the effectiveness of our theory.
